author: Bobbi-Jean MacKinnon
description: No New Brunswickers died from COVID-19 in the past week, marking the first time in more than seven months no new COVID deaths were recorded, according to figures released Tuesday by the province.
title: No new COVID-19 deaths in N.B. for first time since November
content:
